Trade/Device Name(s): Precision Xceed Pro Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Precision Xceed Pro Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Precision Xceed Pro system for quantitative measurement of glucose and β-ketone in whole blood using amperometric biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary, venous, arterial, and neonatal whole blood, and β-ketone in fresh capillary and venous whole blood, as an aid in monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control programs for home or professional use
